createMappingFor(string,address).details: Allows setting the creator address to one other than the caller

previewAddress(string).details: Does not require the origin to be mapped.

safeCreateMappingFor(string,address).details: Allows setting the creator address to one other than the caller

_addressToCreator.details: Internal mapping of address to creator

_addressToOrigin.details: Internal mapping of address to origin

_originToAddress.details: Internal mapping of origin to address

addressOf(string).notice: Returns the address for an origin

createMapping(string).notice: Creates a new mapping entry for an origin to an address

createMappingFor(string,address).notice: Creates a new mapping entry for an origin to an address if one does not exist, else returns the existing address

creatorOf(address).notice: Returns the creator for an address

isOriginMapped(string).notice: Returns whether an origin is mapped

originCreatorOf(string).notice: Returns the creator for an origin

originOf(address).notice: Returns the origin for an address

previewAddress(string).notice: Returns the deterministic address for an origin.

safeCreateMapping(string).notice: Creates a new mapping entry if one does not exist, else returns the existing address

safeCreateMappingFor(string,address).notice: Creates a new mapping entry for an origin to an address if one does not exist, else returns the existing address

userdoc.notice: Immutable mapping of origins to onchain addresses
